name: Deco Dash
description:
In the Deco Dome you make our house your home.
In the Deco Dome you DECORATE OR DIE.

Compete with other happy captives for the luxury of taking home one of the fabulous prizes we picked for our set for you to slap around!

FABULOUS PRIZES! NEW FRIENDS! IGNORE THE CAMERAS!

HOW TO START DECORATING

You can use a mouse and keyboard and/or up to 4 controllers.

  • X / A / Left Mouse Button: Interact with stuff or slap your fellow contestants.
  • Left Stick / WASD: Move and shake.
  • Right Stick: Look and.. shake..?
  • That's it.

Instructions

  1. Find the items we purposefully, thoughtfully, expertly placed throughout our show floor that fit with your professionally assigned style guide.
  2. Take those items from their homes.
  3. Put those items into your home.
  4. 2 4 6 8 THIS IS HOW YOU DEC-OR-ATE.
  5. The more an item matches your professionally assigned style guide the more love it brings your home.
  6. Slap some people around a little maybe? This is cable.
